ClaimCoveragePaymentDetail.name: ClaimCoveragePaymentDetail
ClaimCoveragePaymentDetail.description: Represents the claim coverage amount that must be paid to a recipient for a loss or an expense payment.

ActualExpense.description: The actual expense of the part replacement or labor service.

AdjustedAmount.description: The amount the insurance carrier intends to pay for a loss or benefit after making adjustments for deductibles, copay, or coinsurance.

ChargeTypeCodeId.description: The unique code that identifies the labor charge or expense.

ClaimCoverageId.description: The Claim Coverage associated with the Claim Coverage Payment Detail.

ClaimedAmount.description: The amount claimed by the claimant or service provider to pay for a loss or benefit.

Comment.description: The comments made by the warranty claims adjudicator while adjudicating the claim coverage payment detail.

Description.description: The description of the claim coverage.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view.

Name.description: The name of the claim coverage payment detail.

PriceBookEntryId.description: The entry of the product related to the replacement part in the price book.

ProductRelatedMaterialId.description: The ID of the product related material record that defines the association between the replacement part and the product associated with the claim.

Quantity.description: The quantity of parts replaced or the number of labor hours.

ReplacementPartId.description: The product part that's a replacement for the defective part.

ReturnOrderId.description: The ID of the return order related to the claim coverage payment detail.

ReturnOrderLineItemId.description: The ID of the return order line item related to the claim coverage payment detail.

Status.description: Specifies the status of claim coverage payment detail.

BenefitName.description: The name of the benefit associated with the claim coverage payment detail.

ClaimCoverageReserveDetailId.description: The Claim Coverage Reserve Detail associated with the Claim Coverage Payment Detail.

ClaimParticipantRecipientId.description: The Claim Participant Recipient associated with the Claim Coverage Payment Detail.

ClaimPaymentSummaryId.description: The Claim Payment Summary issued to the Claim Participant Recipient for the Claim Coverage Payment Detail.

ClaimPayoutPlanId.description: The Claim Payout Plan associated with the Claim Coverage Payment Detail.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: If multiple currencies are enabled, this field contains the currency ISO code associated with the record.

LimitUnitCount.description: The unit count that the payment detail represents.

LimitUnitOfMeasure.description: Specifies the unit of measure that the payment detail represents.

PaymentRequestLineId.description: The Payment Request Line associated with the Claim Coverage Payment Detail.

PaymentStatus.description: Specifies the payment status of claim coverage payment detail. This field is available from API version 65.0 and later.

ScheduledPaymentDate.description: The date on which the payment is scheduled.

Type.description: Specifies the type of claim coverage payment detail.
